plugin.name: banner-core
plugin.author: SunGard Higher Education
plugin.title: Banner Core - Framework, Security, & Foundation
plugin.description: \ This plugin adds Spring Security (aka Acegi) and a custom DataSource implementation (BannerDataSource) that together provide for authentication and authorization based upon Banner Security configuration. In addition, this plugin provides additional framework support (e.g., injecting CRUD methods into services) to facilitate development of Banner web applications.
